forecasts.raw_text: NE winds 10 to 15 kt. Seas 2 to 4 ft. Wave  detail: NE 4 ft at 10 seconds and SE 3 ft at 7 seconds. Rain  early, then a chance of rain late.

forecasts.raw_text: SE winds 10 to 15 kt, becoming W 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt in the afternoon. Seas 3 to 5 ft. Wave detail: E 4 ft at 12 seconds and SE 3 ft at 6 seconds. A slight chance of tstms. Rain. Patchy fog.

forecasts.raw_text: W winds 25 to 35 kt, becoming 30 to 35 kt after midnight. Gusts up to 45 kt. Seas 5 to 7 ft, building to 6 to 9 ft after midnight. Wave detail: W 7 ft at 7 seconds and NE 4 ft at 10 seconds, becoming W 9 ft at 8 seconds and NE 2 ft at 12 seconds. Rain, mainly in the evening.
